title: German union, employers in benchmark pay deal
text:
German union, employers in benchmark pay deal 5:32pm GMT - 01:46 
A hard-fought deal on pay and working hours for industrial employees in southwestern Germany sets a benchmark for millions of workers across Europe's largest economy and heralds wage growth in the coming years. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A hard-fought deal on pay and working hours for industrial employees in southwestern Germany sets a benchmark for millions of workers across Europe's largest economy and heralds wage growth in the coming years. David Pollard reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BbA0Me
